definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The scientific community is a good place to start.
sentences.chinese: 科学界是一个从事这一事业很好的地方。

sentences.english: The effect of overseas students on the US scientific community is crucial.
sentences.chinese: 海外留学生在美国科学界有着至关重要的作用。

sentences.english: Figures in science are believed to have used the finagle factor.
sentences.chinese: 一些科学界最主要的人物被认为有过作假的行为。

sentences.english: Yet the re-entry to the politicized world of science in China can be challenging.
sentences.chinese: 不过重入政治化了的中国科学界可能是一个挑战。

sentences.english: The impact of the term Anthropocene has already been felt outside the scientific community.
sentences.chinese: 人类世的影响已经波及到了科学界以外的领域。

sentences.english: Within science, however, the opposite is true.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在科学界恰好相反。

sentences.english: Beijing has a distinctly out-size influence over Chinese science.
sentences.chinese: 北京虽在中国科学界具有绝对影响力。

sentences.english: As a scientist, too, Perutz was always on the fringe.
sentences.chinese: 作为科学家，他也同样一直徘徊在科学界的主流边缘。
他是科学界杰出的人物。

sentences.english: News from the world of science.
sentences.chinese: 让我们看下科学界的新闻。

sentences.english: But science academies' efforts to promote enquiry-based education are relatively new.
sentences.chinese: 但是科学界推广探究式教育的举措才出现不久。

sentences.english: Tamil Nadu has a unique place in the world of Indian science.
sentences.chinese: 泰米尔纳德邦在印度科学界的地位无可替代。

sentences.english: Tang said that the Chinese science community is obsessed with rewards and prizes at all levels.
sentences.chinese: 中国科学界过分追求各级奖励和奖项，唐金陵表示。

sentences.english: The discovery provides pabulum for the scientific community to ruminate on for decades to come.
sentences.chinese: 这项发现为科学界对未来十年的深思提供了精神食粮。

sentences.english: The Palestinians are equipped to become a developed country.
sentences.chinese: 现在，巴勒斯坦科学界正在向发达国家整装待发。

sentences.english: Cold seep and cold seep carbonates are the frontiers in the modern science.
sentences.chinese: 冷泉及冷泉碳酸盐岩是当今科学界研究的前沿之一。

definition: Hawkins or Hawking/Stephen Hawking (1942-2018), English theoretical physicist
